thread.section_title: E-Lodge Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of E-Lodge | elodge.com.au
thread.title: Keith George Nicholson
thread.title_full: E-Lodge reviewed by Keith George Nicholson

author: Keith George Nicholson
title: Keith George Nicholson
text:
As I haven't yet received the 'all clear'from THE ATO, this may be premature.
Last year my wife's tax return went through without a hitch but I did not receive any communication from either the ATO or ELodge so after some time, months, I contacted ELodge who informed me that there was an error on my return. I was able to give the correct information to ELodge and I had my refund in a short time.
This year my wife had entered some incorrect/insufficient information and ELodge corrected it the next day and lodged the return.
So my rating last year of ELodge has gone from 3* to 4* thus year.
